    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_3ddf7c844eb21e5f44e6105a9c1a5554abe1542c</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_3ddf7c844eb21e5f44e6105a9c1a5554abe1542c</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Splitting of rocks by water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbindungsaufspaltung der Felsen durch Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se dédoubler des roches par l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rachar das rochas pela água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spaccando delle roccie da acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαχωρισμός των βράχων από το ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El partir de rocas por el agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that water can split a rock into pieces. Water that gathered along the cracks of the rock freezes and expands during cold weather, pushing the parts of the rock apart.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Wasser einen Felsen 
in Stücke aufspalten kann. Wässern Sie das, das entlang den 
Sprüngen der Felsenfröste erfaßt wird und erweitert bei dem kalten 
Wetter und die Teile des Felsens auseinander drücken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'eau peut couper 
une roche en morceaux. Arrosez cela recueilli le long des 
fissures des gels de roche et augmentez pendant le froid 
survivent à, en poussant les parties de la roche à part.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a água pode rachar 
uma rocha em partes. Molhe isso recolhido ao longo das 
rachaduras dos freezes da rocha e expanda-o durante o tempo frio, 
empurrando as partes da rocha distante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'acqua può 
dividere una roccia in parti. Innaffi quello riunito 
lungo le crepe dei freezes della roccia e si espande durante il tempo 
freddo, spingente le parti della roccia a parte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το ύδωρ μπορεί να 
χωρίσει έναν βράχο στα κομμάτια. Το ύδωρ που σύλλεξε κατά
μήκος των ρωγμών του βράχου παγώνει και επεκτείνεται κατά τη 
διάρκεια του κρύου καιρού, ωθώντας τα μέρη του βράχου χώρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el agua puede 
partir una roca en pedazos. Riegue eso recolectada a lo largo de
las grietas de las heladas de la roca y se amplía durante el tiempo 
frío, empujando las partes de la roca aparte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gelo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ghiaccio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πάγος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hielo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
